addtagstostream.name: AddTagsToStream
addtagstostream.description: Grants permission to add or update tags for the specified Amazon Kinesis stream. Each stream can have up to 10 tags

createstream.name: CreateStream
createstream.description: Grants permission to create a Amazon Kinesis stream

decreasestreamretentionperiod.name: DecreaseStreamRetentionPeriod
decreasestreamretentionperiod.description: Grants permission to decrease the stream's retention period, which is the length of time data records are accessible after they are added to the stream

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy associated with a specified stream or consumer

deletestream.name: DeleteStream
deletestream.description: Grants permission to delete a stream and all its shards and data

deregisterstreamconsumer.name: DeregisterStreamConsumer
deregisterstreamconsumer.description: Grants permission to deregister a stream consumer with a Kinesis data stream

describelimits.name: DescribeLimits
describelimits.description: Grants permission to describe the shard limits and usage for the account

describestream.name: DescribeStream
describestream.description: Grants permission to describe the specified stream

describestreamconsumer.name: DescribeStreamConsumer
describestreamconsumer.description: Grants permission to get the description of a registered stream consumer

describestreamsummary.name: DescribeStreamSummary
describestreamsummary.description: Grants permission to provide a summarized description of the specified Kinesis data stream without the shard list

disableenhancedmonitoring.name: DisableEnhancedMonitoring
disableenhancedmonitoring.description: Grants permission to disables enhanced monitoring

enableenhancedmonitoring.name: EnableEnhancedMonitoring
enableenhancedmonitoring.description: Grants permission to enable enhanced Kinesis data stream monitoring for shard-level metrics

getrecords.name: GetRecords
getrecords.description: Grants permission to get data records from a shard

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to get a resource policy associated with a specified stream or consumer

getsharditerator.name: GetShardIterator
getsharditerator.description: Grants permission to get a shard iterator. A shard iterator expires five minutes after it is returned to the requester

increasestreamretentionperiod.name: IncreaseStreamRetentionPeriod
increasestreamretentionperiod.description: Grants permission to increase the stream's retention period, which is the length of time data records are accessible after they are added to the stream

listshards.name: ListShards
listshards.description: Grants permission to list the shards in a stream and provides information about each shard

liststreamconsumers.name: ListStreamConsumers
liststreamconsumers.description: Grants permission to list the stream consumers registered to receive data from a Kinesis stream using enhanced fan-out, and provides information about each consumer

liststreams.name: ListStreams
liststreams.description: Grants permission to list your streams

listtagsforstream.name: ListTagsForStream
listtagsforstream.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified Amazon Kinesis stream

mergeshards.name: MergeShards
mergeshards.description: Grants permission to merge two adjacent shards in a stream and combines them into a single shard to reduce the stream's capacity to ingest and transport data

putrecord.name: PutRecord
putrecord.description: Grants permission to write a single data record from a producer into an Amazon Kinesis stream

putrecords.name: PutRecords
putrecords.description: Grants permission to write multiple data records from a producer into an Amazon Kinesis stream in a single call (also referred to as a PutRecords request)

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a resource policy to a specified stream or consumer

registerstreamconsumer.name: RegisterStreamConsumer
registerstreamconsumer.description: Grants permission to register a stream consumer with a Kinesis data stream

removetagsfromstream.name: RemoveTagsFromStream
removetagsfromstream.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified Kinesis data stream. Removed tags are deleted and cannot be recovered after this operation successfully completes

splitshard.name: SplitShard
splitshard.description: Grants permission to split a shard into two new shards in the Kinesis data stream, to increase the stream's capacity to ingest and transport data

startstreamencryption.name: StartStreamEncryption
startstreamencryption.description: Grants permission to enable or update server-side encryption using an AWS KMS key for a specified stream

stopstreamencryption.name: StopStreamEncryption
stopstreamencryption.description: Grants permission to disable server-side encryption for a specified stream

subscribetoshard.name: SubscribeToShard
subscribetoshard.description: Grants permission to listen to a specific shard with enhanced fan-out

updateshardcount.name: UpdateShardCount
updateshardcount.description: Grants permission to update the shard count of the specified stream to the specified number of shards

updatestreammode.name: UpdateStreamMode
updatestreammode.description: Grants permission to update the capacity mode of the data stream
